title: Power of 2: Blockout Toolkit
description: Level up your UE level prototyping with Power of 2 Blockout Toolkit. Perfectly scaled meshes (16-512 cm units), absolute grid snapping, enhanced tools for duplication, and alignment tools. A precise, efficient workflow booster.
longDescription:
At our studio, we recognize the need for precision and consistency in game development, especially during the Blockout and prototyping phases. Sometimes having too much flexibility can actually be detrimental. That's why we've developed the Power of 2 Blockout Toolkit, a game-changer for designers and artists working in Unreal Engine.


Why Power of 2?

Our toolkit is built around the concept of power-of-2 dimensions (e.g., 64, 128, 256, 512), aligning seamlessly with common texture resolutions like 512x512 or 1024x1024. This approach ensures that every element — from floor tiles to walls —adheres to a consistent sizing system, greatly simplifying the design process and enhancing alignment with textures.


In the realm of Blockout, Prototyping, or Greybox kits, sizing tends to be somewhat arbitrary. Many attempt to scale with the Unreal Engine skeleton, but often fall short in maintaining consistent dimensions.


The Power of 2 Blockout Toolkit standardizes this aspect by anchoring every element to power-of-2 dimensions. This methodology not only aligns perfectly with common texture resolutions (e.g., 512x512, 1024x1024, 2048x2048) but also facilitates the creation of fractional divisions that are crucial for detailed design work.


  • Floor Tiles: Precisely measured at 512cm x 512cm x 24cm, with a variance of +/- 12cm over the centerline, ensuring a perfect fit in any design layout.
  • Walls: Sized at 512cm x 384cm x 24cm (+/- 12cm over the centerline), these walls integrate seamlessly with other elements.
  • Fractional Scaling: We aim to have object dimensions as fractional multiples of power-of-2 figures, such as 64, 96, 144, etc. This approach guarantees that almost every element you create fits into a harmonious and standard design system.


Join our discord: https://discord.gg/P6tejWKrgq

Ask questions, provide feedback, and request additions to this toolkit!


Beyond mere sizing, the toolkit provides a consistent set of building tools tailored for future content creation. This ensures that as you expand your project, every new element you add will align perfectly with those already in place, maintaining a cohesive and visually appealing design throughout.


Key Features:

  1. Power of Two Precision: Every element, including floors, walls, roofs, and railings, follows power-of-2 dimensions, eliminating arbitrary sizing and ensuring consistent and streamlined placement.
  2. Absolute Position Snapping: Distinct from Unreal Engine's relative location snapping, our toolkit offers absolute position snapping for flawless alignment every time. See `AP2BTCellSnapActor`.
  3. Optimal Iteration: Uniform sizes allow for efficient iteration using a shared design language, enhancing productivity and clarity.
  4. Comprehensive Blockout Set: This set includes a wide range of blockout elements to meet various level design requirements. Requests are always welcome!
  5. Enhanced Workflow: Standardized dimensions reduce errors, streamline workflow, and facilitate collaboration among team members.
  6. Expandable and flexible: Our toolkit's pieces can be combined, resized, and repurposed for flexible level design.
  7. Dedicated Support and Updates: Regular updates and responsive support ensure that the toolkit evolves with the Unreal community's needs. Join the discord and request assets, assistance, future features, and feedback!
  8. Indispensable for Level Designers: An essential tool for designers at any skill level, promoting efficient and error-free design.


The Power of 2 Blockout Toolkit is more than just a collection of assets. It's a comprehensive solution that addresses the specific needs of Unreal Engine designers, enabling them to create more efficiently and with greater accuracy. Whether you're a seasoned level designer or just starting out, our toolkit is an invaluable addition to your design arsenal.
technicalDetails:
Code Modules

  • Power2BlockoutToolkit (Runtime)
  • Power2BlockoutToolkitEditor (Editor)

Assets

  • Number of Unique meshes: 100 Static Meshes
  • Custom Simple Collisions for all relevant meshes.
  • Vertices: Most meshes <50, the most complicated ones have <250.
  • Optimized meshes. Most are basic shapes.
  • Number of Textures: 16 colors x 4 variation per color. ~64 Material Instances
  • Texture Resolution: 2048x2048, 1024x1024, 512x512

Code

  • 80+ Absolute Snap Cell Grid configured Blueprint Data Only Assets
  • 20+ Misc Editor Utility widget blueprints
  • 9 C++ Classes

Misc

  • Tested for Windows but will provide best support as I can to other platforms.
  • Additional Documentation: https://brokenrockstudios.com/products/plugins/p2bt
  • Join Discord for feedback/support/requests.
